snippet.title: Piñata Puppy World - Game Teaser Announcement
snippet.description:
Piñata Puppy World is a 2000’s nostalgia driven explorative campaign game with a dramatic and surreal storyline disguised within the genre of “Mascot Horror”. 

With the intention to address the mental health struggles and wide varying feelings of nostalgic depression, our game is able to tackle and tell the player a bittersweet narrative as we figuratively walk through the steps of reflecting on the past, via walking through the old memories & location of the children’s center, “Piñata Puppy World”.

DEVELOPER GAMEJOLT PAGE:
https://gamejolt.com/@Taaryn/games

Teaser into the new Real Time Studio indie-game, Piñata Puppy World.

Real Time Studio is a indie-game studio creating music, 3D-animation and an original game project. 

Our social media links:
[@StudioIRT]
(Instagram, Twitter, YouTube)

#indiehorror #gamedev #nostalgia #2000s #PPW
